sections.heading: Why Product Photos Matter More Than Anything Else
sections.body: On Shopify, product photos decide whether someone stays or bounces. Clean visuals increase trust, reduce friction, and instantly communicate product quality.

sections.heading: The 4 Must-Have Image Types
sections.body:
1. Hero product image. Clean white background.

2. Lifestyle context shot. Show real environments.

3. Detail close-ups. Textures and materials.

4. Benefit callouts. Add simple overlays.
sections.imagePrompt: Minimal Shopify hero product image with perfect lighting. 1:1.
sections.imageAlt: Minimal hero shot on white background.

sections.heading: How AI Helps
sections.body: AI renders shadows, reflections, lighting, and consistency at studio quality. It enables brands to produce dozens of variations without expensive photoshoots.
sections.imagePrompt: Soft daylight studio-style rendering of dropper bottle with subtle reflections. 1:1.

sections.heading: Best Practices
sections.body:
• Keep backgrounds neutral.
  • Avoid inconsistent lighting.
  • Use matching angles across catalog.
  • Show the product clearly and cleanly.

sections.heading: Final Takeaway
sections.body: Shopify customers judge quality in seconds. AI helps you deliver professional images instantly and consistently.
